IndexPageText.title: %brand% — Online Image Cleanup: Remove Background Colors, Shadows, Stickers
IndexPageText.description: %brand% is a free, privacy‑first image cleanup suite. Remove background colors, shadows, stickers/emojis, and export high‑quality images (PNG with transparency, JPG, WebP) — all in your browser, no signup.
IndexPageText.descriptionBelowH1Text: Remove background colors, shadows, and stickers/emojis — free, no signup.
IndexPageText.toolShadowDesc: Automatically detect and remove harsh shadows to improve lighting and clarity. Ideal for product shots and portraits.
IndexPageText.toolEmojiDesc: Erase stickers, emojis, and overlays without damaging the underlying content. Great for social posts and screenshots.
IndexPageText.toolColorDesc: Precisely remove a target color and similar shades. Make backgrounds transparent and export clean images (PNG/JPG/WebP).
IndexPageText.positioningDesc: A lightweight, privacy‑first online image cleanup suite that runs entirely in your browser. Fast, free, and ideal for quick edits without uploading files.
IndexPageText.user1: E‑commerce sellers — clean product backgrounds for listings
IndexPageText.user2: Designers & marketers — quick edits for campaigns and mockups
IndexPageText.user3: Social creators — remove stickers and color casts for posts
IndexPageText.user4: Students & teachers — prepare images for slides and assignments
IndexPageText.user5: Developers — prototype assets without leaving the browser
IndexPageText.intro1: Remove a specific color or make backgrounds transparent
IndexPageText.intro2: Eliminate shadows to improve lighting and clarity
IndexPageText.removeWhatDesc: See examples of removing colors, shadows, and stickers.
IndexPageText.why1Desc: Start editing immediately without creating an account.
IndexPageText.why2Desc: All tools are completely free for everyone.
IndexPageText.why3Desc: Your photos are processed locally in your browser for privacy.
IndexPageText.faqSubtitle: Answers to common questions about privacy, cost, and capabilities.
IndexPageText.faq1Answer: It means removing unwanted elements like shadows, text, or objects from an image to make it look cleaner.
IndexPageText.faq3Answer: No, we process images locally in your browser to ensure your privacy.
IndexPageText.faq4Question: Can I make the background transparent?
IndexPageText.faq4Answer: Yes. Use Remove Color to target background hues; choose PNG to preserve transparency, or JPG/WebP if transparency isn’t needed.
IndexPageText.faq5Question: How do I get smoother edges?
IndexPageText.faq5Answer: Use Refine to smooth and feather the mask. Increase strength for softer edges on complex backgrounds.
IndexPageText.faq6Question: Does it work on large images?
IndexPageText.faq6Answer: Yes, modern browsers handle high‑resolution images well; performance depends on device.
IndexPageText.howTitleHome: How to Use Cleanup Pictures — Step by Step

CommonText.footerDescText: CleanupPictures.org - The best online tool to clean up your images.

ToolPageText.uploadDesc: Drag & drop or click to upload (JPG, PNG, WEBP)
ToolPageText.step1Sub: Upload your images from your device or computer (JPG/PNG/WebP).
ToolPageText.step2Sub: Pick color, adjust tolerance or run clean; auto‑refine improves edges.
ToolPageText.step3Sub: Download as PNG (transparent), JPG, or WebP. Choose PNG to keep transparency.
ToolPageText.tolTip: Increase to include more similar shades; may affect fine details
ToolPageText.refineTip: Smooth and feather the mask to reduce jagged edges
ToolPageText.autoRefineTip: Automatically adapts refine strength based on image; disable to use slider only

RemoveShadowPage.title: Remove Shadow from Photo Online – Free Shadow Reduction Tool
RemoveShadowPage.description: Reduce harsh shadows and improve lighting in your photos online. No Photoshop required. Adjust shadow strength and download instantly.
RemoveShadowPage.aboutDesc: This tool reduces the intensity of harsh shadows and balances uneven lighting to make photos look more natural. It does not fully remove shadows.
RemoveShadowPage.howTitle: How to Reduce Shadows in a Photo
RemoveShadowPage.how2: Adjust the Shadow Reduction strength slider.
RemoveShadowPage.how3: Preview the result and download as PNG/JPG/WebP.
RemoveShadowPage.faq1A: Shadow reduction softens dark areas and balances lighting so photos look more natural.
RemoveShadowPage.faq2Q: Is this the same as removing shadows?
RemoveShadowPage.faq2A: No. It reduces the intensity of shadows but does not fully remove them.
RemoveShadowPage.faq3A: No. Everything runs directly in your browser.
RemoveShadowPage.faq4A: Images are processed locally in your browser and are not permanently stored.

RemoveEmojiPage.title: Remove Emoji from Image Online - CleanupPictures.org
RemoveEmojiPage.description: Remove emojis, stickers, and doodles from images instantly.
RemoveEmojiPage.aboutDesc: Clear up your images by removing emojis and stickers that cover the content.
RemoveEmojiPage.faq1A: Yes, it works perfectly on mobile browsers.

RemoveColorPage.title: Remove Color from Image Online | Free Transparent Background Remover
RemoveColorPage.description: Remove any color from images online. Make backgrounds transparent (white/black/green) and download high‑quality images (PNG/JPG/WebP). No signup required.
RemoveColorPage.aboutDesc: The 'Remove Color from Image' tool lets you make any color transparent directly in your browser. Click to pick a color, adjust tolerance to include similar shades, remove multiple colors in sequence, and download as PNG or WebP to preserve transparency, or as JPG when transparency isn’t needed. All processing happens locally for privacy.
RemoveColorPage.how1: Upload a JPG, PNG, or WebP image.
RemoveColorPage.how2: Click the Original to pick the color to remove.
RemoveColorPage.how3: Adjust Tolerance to widen or narrow similar shades.
RemoveColorPage.how4: Click the Processed result to remove leftover artifacts.
RemoveColorPage.how5: Use Undo or Reset Edits to refine.
RemoveColorPage.how6: Download as PNG/WebP (transparent) or JPG (no transparency).
RemoveColorPage.faq1Q: How do I remove a specific color from an image?
RemoveColorPage.faq1A: Upload your image, click the color on the Original view to remove, adjust Tolerance to include similar shades, then download as PNG/WebP to keep transparency, or JPG if transparency isn’t needed.
RemoveColorPage.faq2Q: Is this tool free to use?
RemoveColorPage.faq2A: Yes, our Remove Color tool is completely free. There are no hidden fees, no credit card required, and no watermarks on your downloaded images.
RemoveColorPage.faq3Q: Can I remove the white background from a logo?
RemoveColorPage.faq3A: Absolutely! This is one of the best use cases. Just click on the white background, and it will become transparent instantly.
RemoveColorPage.faq4A: Yes. We process all images locally within your web browser using advanced canvas technology. Your photos are never uploaded to any server, ensuring 100% privacy.
